titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of pharmaceutical grade phospholipids and soybean oil.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E314-315)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) reduce the current duty on pharmaceutical grade phospholipids; and (2) grant them, as well as pharmaceutical grade soybean oil, duty-free treatment if pharmaceutical products are granted duty-free status by an agreement which enters into force and effect with respect to the United States.
